sentence: 2022 WATCH — “The banners and big red video screen all said Dr. Oz, the host gave a rousing introduction and in strode the candidate, MEHMET OZ, to take up the microphone and become the center of attention for more than an hour,” reports AP’s Marc Levy from Newtown, Pa. “Welcome to Oz’s campaign for U.S. Senate, where the celebrity heart surgeon and former host of daytime TV’s ‘Dr.
title: POLITICO Playbook: Your guide through a blizzard of news in Ukraine

sentence: DR. MEHMET OZ (R), CANDIDATE FOR U.S. SENATE IN PENNSYLVANIA: Let's put some numbers on it, Sean, because I have addressed this issue my entire career.
